# Unicode Math Symbols {#sec-unicode}

## Python Script Comment Snippets

``` txt
Area = 25 m²  
Volume = 3.2 m³  
Density of water = 1000 kg/m³  
Angle = 45°  
Angular speed = 12 s⁻¹  

Area = π·r²  

Law of sines:
T₁ / sin(θ₁) = T₂ / sin(θ₂) = W / sin(θ₃)

Law of cosines:
cos(θ) = (a² + b² − c²) / (2ab)
cos(θₚ) = (J² + T² − P²) / (2·J·T)

Energy equation:
P₁ + ½ρv₁² + ρgz₁ = P₂ + ½ρv₂² + ρgz₂
```

## Math Symbols

| Symbol | Name                  | SI Units |
|--------|-----------------------|----------|
| √      | Square root           | —        |
| ∑      | Summation             | —        |
| ∫      | Integral              | —        |
| ∞      | Infinity              | —        |
| ≤      | Less than or equal    | —        |
| ≥      | Greater than or equal | —        |
| ≠      | Not equal             | —        |
| ⟂      | Perpendicular         | —        |
| ⌀      | Diameter              | m        |

: Math Symbols

## Kinematics & Dynamics

| Symbol | Meaning              | SI Units |
|--------|----------------------|----------|
| ω      | Angular velocity     | rad·s⁻¹  |
| α      | Angular acceleration | rad·s⁻²  |
| θ      | Angular position     | rad      |

: Kinematics & Dynamics

## Fluids

| Symbol | Meaning              | SI Units |
|--------|----------------------|----------|
| ρ      | Density              | kg·m⁻³   |
| μ      | Dynamic viscosity    | Pa·s     |
| ν      | Kinematic viscosity  | m²·s⁻¹   |
| p      | Pressure             | Pa       |
| h      | Head                 | m        |
| ṁ      | Mass flow rate       | kg·s⁻¹   |
| v̇      | Volumetric flow rate | m³·s⁻¹   |

: Fluids
